languages.text: Показатель отношений {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} с фракциями {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Чем выше показатель репутации с фракцией, тем шире доступный ассортимент товаров у ее торговцев. Чтобы улучшить свою репутацию с определенной фракцией, выполняйте поручения ее представителей и передавайте торговцам ценные грузы.
languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader's{/g} relationship with the factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the Reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your Reputation with a particular faction, complete the orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to merchants.

traits.locale_text: Показатель отношений {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} с фракциями {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Чем выше показатель репутации с фракцией, тем шире доступный ассортимент товаров у ее торговцев. Чтобы улучшить свою репутацию с определенной фракцией, выполняйте поручения ее представителей и передавайте торговцам ценные грузы.

languages.text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

languages.text: Ein Indikator für die Beziehung des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlers{/g} zu den verschiedenen Fraktionen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Je höher der Ruf bei einer Fraktion ist, desto größer ist die Bandbreite der verfügbaren Waren ihrer Vertreter. Um deinen Ruf bei einer bestimmten Fraktion zu erhöhen, führe Aufträge für ihre Vertreter aus und transferiere wertvolle Fracht an ihre Händler.
languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

traits.locale_text: Ein Indikator für die Beziehung des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlers{/g} zu den verschiedenen Fraktionen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}Ruf{/g} bei einer Fraktion ist, desto größer ist die Bandbreite der verfügbaren Waren ihrer Vertreter. Um deinen Ruf bei einer bestimmten Fraktion zu erhöhen, führe Aufträge für ihre Vertreter aus und transferiere wertvolle Fracht an ihre Händler.

languages.text: Indicateur des relations du {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} avec les différentes factions des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Plus la réputation d'une faction est élevée, plus le choix de marchandises disponibles auprès de ses représentants est varié. Pour améliorer votre réputation auprès d'une faction donnée, passez des commandes pour ses représentants et transférez des cargaisons de valeur à ses marchands.
languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

traits.locale_text: Indicateur des relations du {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Libre-Marchand{/g} avec les différentes factions des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Plus la {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}réputation{/g} d'une faction est élevée, plus le {g|Encyclopedia:Range}choix{/g} de marchandises disponibles auprès de ses représentants est large. Pour améliorer votre réputation auprès d'une faction particulière, passez des commandes pour ses représentants et transférez des chargements de valeur à ses marchands.

languages.text: 代表{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}不同派系之间的关系。您在某个派系中的声望越高，派系代表为您提供的商品种类就会越丰富。若想提高在某个派系中的声望，您需要完成派系代表的订单，并将有价值的货物转交给该派系的商人。
languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

traits.locale_text: 代表{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}不同派系之间的关系。您在某个派系中的{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}声望{/g}越高，派系代表为您提供的商品种类就会越丰富。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}若想提高在某个派系中的声望，您需要完成派系代表的订单，并将有价值的货物转交给该派系的商人。

languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader's{/g} relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

languages.text: Un indicador de la relación de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} con las distintas facciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Cuanto mayor sea la reputación con una facción, más extenso es el catálogo de productos de sus representantes. Para aumentar tu reputación con una facción en concreto, completa pedidos para sus representantes y transfiere cargamento valioso a sus mercaderes.
languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

traits.locale_text: Un indicador de la relación de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} con las distintas facciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputación{/g} con una facción, más extenso es el {g|Encyclopedia:Range}catálogo{/g} de productos de sus representantes. Para aumentar tu reputación con una facción en concreto, completa pedidos para sus representantes y transfiere cargamento valioso a sus mercaderes.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}のさまざまな勢力との関係を示す指標。勢力での評判が高ければ高いほど、その勢力の代表者から入手できる商品の幅は広くなる。特定の勢力に対する評判を上げるには、その勢力の代表者の注文をこなし、貴重な貨物をその勢力の商人に転送する。
languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}のさまざまな勢力との関係を示す指標。勢力での{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}評判{/g}が高ければ高いほど、その勢力の代表者から入手できる商品の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}幅{/g}は広くなる。特定の勢力に対する評判を上げるには、その勢力の代表者の注文をこなし、貴重な貨物をその勢力の商人に転送する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ndeki{/g} farklı fraksiyonlarla ilişkisinin bir göstergesidir. Bir fraksiyondaki itibarı ne kadar yüksekse fraksiyonun temsilcisinin ona sunduğu mal yelpazesi de o kadar geniş olur. Belirli bir fraksiyondaki itibarını artırmak için, temsilcilerinin verdiği görevleri yerine getir ve tüccarlarına değerli kargolar teslim et.
languages.original_text: An indicator of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s relationship with different factions of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The higher the reputation with a faction is, the wider is the range of available goods from its representatives. To increase your reputation with a particular faction, complete orders for its representatives and transfer valuable cargo to its merchants.
